item.title: The Net Neutrality Debate
item.description: Net Neutrality is dead, at least for now. As a non-American you might be like, oh this is in the United States, I don't even care. But this is huge, not before long ISP's in your country might start pushing for the same with devastating ripple effects. Read on to find how you can prevent this
